allow:
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ sqlite3 ~/.claude-task-tracker/tasks.db "
.mode column
.headers on

-- 最近的 sessions
SELECT session_id, substr\(original_goal, 1, 40\) as goal, current_status, last_activity 
FROM sessions 
ORDER BY last_activity DESC 
LIMIT 5;
")

Bash(TRANSCRIPT="/Users/wukangda/.claude/projects/-Users-wukangda-Desktop-claude-notification/97f39cae-8b7b-4f98-8f27-3db46884ddb8.jsonl" echo "=== 最后 5 条 user 类型事件 ===" grep '""""type"""":""""user""""' "$TRANSCRIPT")

Bash(TRANSCRIPT="/Users/wukangda/.claude/projects/-Users-wukangda-Desktop-claude-notification/97f39cae-8b7b-4f98-8f27-3db46884ddb8.jsonl" echo "=== 最后 3 条 user 类型事件的 content 类型 ===" grep '""""type"""":""""user""""' "$TRANSCRIPT")

Bash(TRANSCRIPT="/Users/wukangda/.claude/projects/-Users-wukangda-Desktop-claude-notification/97f39cae-8b7b-4f98-8f27-3db46884ddb8.jsonl" echo "=== 搜索包含 ''''The user sent'''' 的内容 ===" grep -o '""""The user sent[^""""]*""""' "$TRANSCRIPT")

Bash(TRANSCRIPT="/Users/wukangda/.claude/projects/-Users-wukangda-Desktop-claude-notification/97f39cae-8b7b-4f98-8f27-3db46884ddb8.jsonl" echo "=== 搜索 ''''user sent the following message'''' ===" grep -i "user sent the following message" "$TRANSCRIPT")

Bash(TRANSCRIPT="/Users/wukangda/.claude/projects/-Users-wukangda-Desktop-claude-notification/97f39cae-8b7b-4f98-8f27-3db46884ddb8.jsonl" echo "=== 直接搜索 git 查看 ===" grep -c "git" "$TRANSCRIPT" echo "" echo "=== 搜索 deepwiki ===" grep "deepwiki" "$TRANSCRIPT")

Bash(TRANSCRIPT="/Users/wukangda/.claude/projects/-Users-wukangda-Desktop-claude-notification/97f39cae-8b7b-4f98-8f27-3db46884ddb8.jsonl" echo "=== 所有包含 ''''user sent'''' 的内容 ===" grep -o "user sent the following message[^P]*Please" "$TRANSCRIPT")
